text:
We asked @TeamLufkinISD Head Trainer Vanessa Jimenez WHY she took the #COVID19 #vaccine & she said, "For my student athletes and family."
What's Your "Why?" #TakeYourShot & #ShareYourWhy @ the FREE COVID-19 Vaccine Clinic! Register at https://t.co/nIfvG8naDc or call 936.630.8500. https://t.co/BVrH6OhtHq
